item.title: The Importance of Mobile Privacy
item.description: At Stegos, our primary development focus right now is our mobile app, and with it our fully private messaging system. This is a crucial part of our vision, because true online privacy is impossible without private transactions AND private communications working in tandem. Recently, we shared a video showcasing the current development state of our mobile app. In case you missed it, check out the video below: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W7pzQ97BRUY Development has progressed significantly since that version, but the following features were already on display:
